description.original: This Plugin enables the use of Markdown Emoji Shortcodes :smile:
description.translation: This Plugin enables the use of Markdown Emoji Shortcodes :smile:

dict..setDesc('If this is turned on, Emoji sh: .setDesc('如果此项打开，Emoji shortcodes 将会被输入后立即替换。否则仅以短码存储，您只有在预览模式才能看到 Emoji')
dict..setDesc('If this is turned on, a Sugges: .setDesc('如果此项打开，当您每次输入紧跟 : 的字母时将获得建议。这会对插入 Emoji 大有裨益。（此项在移动端不起效）')
dict..setDesc('If you like this Plugin, consi: .setDesc('如果您喜欢此插件，希望您考虑捐献以支持继续开发：')
dict..createEl('h2', { text: 'Emoji Shortcode: .createEl('h2', { text: 'Emoji Shortcodes Plugin 表情短码输入插件' })
